cbinstall.name: RSGallery2
cbinstall.author: Dave Ludwigsen
cbinstall.description: Displays a rudimentary tab with RSGallery2 information. This alpha release contains a listing of all galleries the user has uploaded with a random image for the thumbnail. If the user is in his or her own gallery, it also displays a link to edit his or her own galleries. There are currently no parameters.
